sentences.en: Richard told me of three 16th-century folio volumes on alchemy.
sentences.cn: 理查德告诉过我16 世纪的关于炼金术的三卷对开本书籍的事。

sentences.en: Fearful alchemy is a useful definition of slavery.
sentences.cn: 可怕的炼金术是奴隶制的一个有建设性的定义。

sentences.en: It is there that a kind of alchemy occurs when we breathe up and out the passing whiffs of our chewed food.
sentences.cn: 当我们吸入和呼出咀嚼食物产生的气体时，这个部位就会发生一些神秘的变化。
